description.value:
Variant of the Wolf Pelt Chapter Trapping (Adds +2 to Intimidate Tests). Also Grants +10 to Fellowship Tests with Astartes, and +20 Loyalty with Fenrisian Wolf Followers.

Effect: Respected

Notes: 10 R
